activities: We capture personally identifiable customer information through a series of web-enabled applications for our clients as part of an outsourced hosted application service for customer relationship and order management.  As a part of this service, we offer data storage, data presentation in a back-office user interface, payment automation services, and fulfillment integration services to provide a means of sales-order management.  Actions that take place utilizing customer information includes (but is not limited to) payment card authorizations/sales, refunds/voids, chargeback management, shipper integration for the logistical means of delivering packages, customer service operations, as well as data analysis for reporting and analytics.  We capture, store, and use personal information in compliance with legal obligations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
